name: Recology 25% Low-Income Discount Program
description: 25% discount on garbage collection bills for qualifying customers
fullDescription: Recology San Francisco offers a 25% discount on garbage collection bills for income-qualified San Francisco residents, helping reduce the cost of essential waste services.
whatTheyOffer:
- 25% discount on garbage collection bills
- Applies to all Recology refuse services
- Includes recycling and composting
- Automatic discount once enrolled
- Available to income-qualified residents
- Renew periodically to maintain discount
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Francisco resident
2. Check income eligibility requirements
3. Submit application through SF.gov
4. Provide income documentation
5. Once approved, discount applied to future bills
6. Re-certify as required
